update.description:
This starts to add cppcheck and cpplint to ignition-cmake.

The currently does not check components...could use some work.

Addresss issue #72

[See ignition-math PR #242](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/242) for example usage.

content.raw: `SEND_ERROR` still causes the build to fail. Perhaps we could use `WARNING` instead?

content.raw: true, but `IgnCodeCoverage.cmake` is only included if the user explicitly sets the `CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Coverage`, whereas this file is being included unconditionally
content.html: true, but IgnCodeCoverage.cmake is only included if the user explicitly sets the CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Coverage, whereas this file is being included unconditionally

content.raw: Hm... good point. The `code_check.sh` script takes a parameter in order to generate xml output. @\_jrivero_ what if `make codecheck` always generated junit xml?
content.html: Hm... good point. The code_check.sh script takes a parameter in order to generate xml output. @_jrivero_ what if make codecheck always generated junit xml?

content.raw: I didn't integrate XML generation or jenkins support in the PR. We'd have to change the jenkin scripts to run `make codecheck` instead of  the original `code_check.sh`, right?
content.html: I didn't integrate XML generation or jenkins support in the PR. We'd have to change the jenkin scripts to run make codecheck instead of the original code_check.sh, right?

pull_request.title: Adding cppcheck and cpplint with codecheck target

pullrequest.title: Adding cppcheck and cpplint with codecheck target

pull_request.title: Adding cppcheck and cpplint with codecheck target

pullrequest.title: Adding cppcheck and cpplint with codecheck target

content.raw:
I think I'd recommend having the following setup:

```
set(IGNITION_CMAKE_SHARE_DIR "@CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX@/share/ignition/@PROJECT_NAME_LOWER@")
set(IGNITION_CMAKE_DOXYGEN_DIR "${IGNITION_CMAKE_SHARE_DIR}/doxygen")
set(IGNITION_CMAKE_CODECHECK_DIR "${IGNITION_CMAKE_SHARE_DIR}/codecheck")
```

We should also probably put the various cmake modules into `${IGNITION_CMAKE_SHARE_DIR}/modules`, similar to the recommendation made [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/issues/21/installation-directory-is-architecture).
content.html:
I think I'd recommend having the following setup:

set(IGNITION_CMAKE_SHARE_DIR "@CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX@/share/ignition/@PROJECT_NAME_LOWER@")
set(IGNITION_CMAKE_DOXYGEN_DIR "${IGNITION_CMAKE_SHARE_DIR}/doxygen")
set(IGNITION_CMAKE_CODECHECK_DIR "${IGNITION_CMAKE_SHARE_DIR}/codecheck")

We should also probably put the various cmake modules into ${IGNITION_CMAKE_SHARE_DIR}/modules, similar to the recommendation made here.

content.raw:
we could also consider adding [cpplint_to_cppcheckxml.py](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/25df4fb10d33a9baaccdf4d48f99ca7fd4f26584/tools/cpplint_to_cppcheckxml.py?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default), which helps with jenkins results, I believe

cc @\_jrivero_
content.html:
we could also consider adding cpplint_to_cppcheckxml.py, which helps with jenkins results, I believe

cc @_jrivero_
